languages.text: "Игрушка Тервантьяса. Хозяин использовал меня... с помощью того, что ныне оплетает мой разум и подчиняет меня и мои силы своей воле. Я — инструмент, чтобы скрывать логово от чужих глаз чарами вуали. Если бы провидец мон-кай не услышала мои мольбы о помощи... вы бы меня никогда не нашли".

traits.locale_text: "Тервантьяс использовал меня для экспериментов со своей новой игрушкой — он называл ее пси-дампер. С помощью нее он подчинил меня и мои силы своей воле. Теперь я всего лишь инструмент, который позволяет ему укрывать эту лабораторию от посторонних глаз с помощью моих сил".
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
languages.original_text: "Игрушка Тервантьяса. Хозяин использовал меня... с помощью того, что ныне оплетает мой разум и подчиняет меня и мои силы своей воле. Я — инструмент, чтобы скрывать логово от чужих глаз чарами вуали. Если бы провидец мон-кай не услышала мои мольбы о помощи... вы бы меня никогда не нашли".

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from the plain eye with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh clairvoyant not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from the plain eye with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh clairvoyant not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: “我是特万提亚斯的玩物。主人利用了我……直到现在，他的折磨还纠缠着我的思想，命令我服从于他的意志。我是他的工具，是我利用亚空间的能量将这个巢穴隐藏起来。如果不是因为那个猴子先知听到了我的呼救……你永远都找不到我。”
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: “我是特万提亚斯的玩物。主人利用了我……直到现在，他的折磨还纠缠着我的思想，命令我服从于他的意志。我是他的工具，是我利用亚空间的能量将这个巢穴隐藏起来。如果不是因为那个猴子先知听到了我的呼救……你永远都找不到我。”
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: «El juguete de Tervantias. El amo me usó... de forma que mi mente quedó enmarañada y mis poderes doblegados a su voluntad. Soy la herramienta que oculta su guarida de la realidad con las energías del velo. De no ser porque la vidente mon-keigh escuchó mis súplicas de socorro... jamás me habrías encontrado».
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: «El juguete de Tervantias. El amo me usó... de forma que mi mente quedó enmarañada y mis poderes doblegados a su voluntad. Soy la herramienta que oculta su guarida de la realidad con las energías del velo. De no ser porque la vidente mon-keigh escuchó mis súplicas de socorro... jamás me habrías encontrado».
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Tervantias' Spielzeug. Der Meister hat mich ausgenutzt ... Durch das Gerät, das nun meinen Verstand fesselt und mich und meine Kräfte seinem Willen unterwirft. Ich bin das Werkzeug, das dieses Versteck durch die Energien des Schleiers vor neugierigen Augen verbirgt. Hätte die Chem-Pan-Sey-Seherin meine Hilferufe nicht gehört ... hättet Ihr mich nie gefunden."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias' Spielzeug. Der Meister hat mich ausgenutzt ... Durch das Gerät, das nun meinen Verstand fesselt und mich und meine Kräfte seinem Willen unterwirft. Ich bin das Werkzeug, das dieses Versteck durch die Energien des Schleiers vor neugierigen Augen verbirgt. Hätte die Chem-Pan-Sey-Seherin meine Hilferufe nicht gehört ... hättet Ihr mich nie gefunden."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスの玩具だ。マスターは私を利用した…私の心を絡め取り、私の力を意のままにすることで。私はヴェールのエネルギーで、この隠れ家を好奇の目から隠す道具なのだ。モン＝ケイの予知者が私の助けを求める声を聞いていなかったなら…お前は私を見つけられなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスの玩具だ。マスターは私を利用した…私の心を絡め取り、私の力を意のままにすることで。私はヴェールのエネルギーで、この隠れ家を好奇の目から隠す道具なのだ。モン＝ケイの予知者が私の助けを求める声を聞いていなかったなら…お前は私を見つけられなかっただろう」
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: « Le jouet de Tervantias. Le maître m'a utilisé... en employant des moyens qui ont asservi mon esprit et mes pouvoirs pour me forcer à servir ses desseins. Je suis l'outil qui dissimule ce repaire aux yeux trop curieux à l'aide des énergies du voile. Si la prophétesse mon-keigh n'avait pas entendu mon appel à l'aide... vous ne m'auriez jamais trouvé. »
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: « Le jouet de Tervantias. Le maître m'a utilisé... en employant des moyens qui ont asservi mon esprit et mes pouvoirs pour me forcer à servir ses desseins. Je suis l'outil qui dissimule ce repaire aux yeux trop curieux à l'aide des énergies du voile. Si la prophétesse mon-keigh n'avait pas entendu mon appel à l'aide... vous ne m'auriez jamais trouvé. »
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Tervantias'ın oyuncağıyım. Efendim şimdilerde zihnimi bulandıran, beni ve güçlerimi kendi iradesi doğrultusunda şekillendiren amaçlarla beni kullandı. Örtünün enerjisiyle yuvasını meraklı gözlerden gizleyen araç benim. Meydum mon-keigh, yardım çığlıklarımı duymasaydı... Beni asla bulamazdınız."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias's plaything. The master used me... by means of that which now entangles my mind and bends me and my powers to its will. I am the tool that conceals this lair from prying eyes with the energies of the veil. Had the mon-keigh seer not heard my pleas for help... you never would have found me."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias'ın oyuncağıyım. Efendim şimdilerde zihnimi bulandıran, beni ve güçlerimi kendi iradesine göre şekillendiren amaçlar için beni kullandı. Yuvasını, örten enerjilerle meraklı gözlerden gizleyen araç benim. Mon-keigh medyumu yardım çığlıklarımı duymasaydı... Beni asla bulamazdınız."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer
